憍憍憍
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

憍字的基本解释

憍
jiāo
持矜。古同骄傲的“骄”。
气宇高仰：“方虚憍而恃气。”

憍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiāo］
［《廣韻》舉喬切，平宵，見。］
(1)同“驕”。骄傲；骄矜。
(2)高仰。

憍字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　憍； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页402第07
【廣韻】舉喬切【集韻】【韻會】居妖切，?音驕。【集韻】逸也，矜也。【廣韻】憐也，恣也。【周武王·觴豆銘】戒之憍，憍則逃。　又通作驕。【左傳·隱三年】驕奢淫泆。【疏】驕，謂恃己凌物。　亦通作喬。【禮·樂記】齊音敖辟喬志。　又【正韻】堅堯切，音驍。義同。　又【廣韻】巨嬌切【集韻】渠嬌切，?音趫。【集韻】虛憍，高仰也。　又【韻會】居夭切。小人得志也。

憍字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
憍字的起名意思

暂无。

arrogant
Basic explanation of words
arrogant
jiāo
Hold on. Gu Tong's proud "arrogance".
Qi Yu raised up: "Fang Xu is suffocated and suffocated."
arrogant
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiāo］
["Guangyun" cite Qiaoqie, Ping Xiao, see you. ]
(1) Same as "arrogance". Proud; arrogant.
(2) Highly up.
arrogant
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　憍; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 402 07
[Guang Yun] Ju Qiao Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] In the demon cut, sound arrogant. [Ji Yun] Yi Ye, Jin Ye. [Guang Yun] Lian Ye, arrogant. 【Zhou Wuwang·Bodou Inscription】Suppress the ring, and flee if you hold back.　Also arrogant. [Zuo Zhuan·Hidden Three Years] Extravagant and prosperous. [Sparse] arrogance, that is, relying on one's own things.　Also pass as Joe. [Li·Le Ji] Qi Yin Ao Pi Qiao Zhi.　[Zheng Yun] Jian Yao cut, sound Xiao. The same meaning.　 [Guang Yun] Ju Jiao cut [Ji Yun] Qu Jiao cut,? Yin 趫. 【Ji Yun】Fantasy, high up.　[Yunhui] Juyao cut again. The villain is also determined.
arrogant

прил. вм. 骄 (надменный, высокомерный)
